This website presents all the code used in "An X-linked meiotic drive allele has strong, recessive fitness costs in female Drosophila pseudoobscura" by William Larner, Tom Price, Luke Holman, and Nina Wedell (_Proceedings of the Royal Society B_, http://dx.doi.org/10.1098/rspb.2019.2038).



# Statistical analysis
Click [here](statistics.html) to see the code used to analyse and plot the female fecundity data.

# Population genetic model
Click [here](population_genetic_model.html) to see the code used to run the model that derives expected frequencies of SR.
